posts.title: White House Correspondents’ Association cancels plans to have a comedian headline annual dinner
top_comments:
>Instead, the association says it will celebrate the First Amendment and the free press.

Also irony.
I always find it hilarious the man who bullies everyone under the guise of a joke can’t take one himself. I’m sure it’s a narcissist thing.

>"At this consequential moment for journalism, I want to ensure the focus is not on the politics of division but entirely on awarding our colleagues for their outstanding work and providing scholarship and mentorship to the next generation of journalists"

Sit, lie down, play dead. Good doggy.
They're too chicken to have a real comedian, and comedians on their side of the aisle are probably gonna say a lot of really racist shit.
lol any comedian worth their salt would have absolutely brutally buried this administration with joke after joke. I can’t blame them for canceling. The roast would have been REAL!
Softer than baby shit.
Cancel this fucking dinner. No respectable journalist should show up to rub elbows with this authoritarian administration.

She told hosts comedian Samantha Bee and Beast Chief Content Officer Joanna Coles that the Trump administration are “kind of a bunch of murderers,” adding that playing to both sides “makes them feel like human beings, but they shouldn’t get to feel that way, ‘cause they’re not.”

HA
Get Bill Burr you cowards

Elon: “the left killed comedy”
The right: “no comedy this year.”

posts.title: Protests hit Tesla dealerships across the world in challenge to Elon Musk
top_comments:
Just a friendly reminder that he views these protests as a form of economic warfare and would prosecute everyone there if he could. He absolutely hates this stuff. Look at how emotional he got when someone made fun of the stock prices, he called him evil lol.

Keep it up everybody.

That's ok...seems like Nikola may be making a comeback. /s

This shit is getting obscene...listen to Trump explain his Pardon...

" I think..."

" I think he was exonerated"

" I don't know but I got lotsa references "

*On Saturday, with more than 200 events planned worldwide, protests kicked off midday in front of Tesla showrooms in Australia and New Zealand and then rippled across Europe in countries including Finland, Norway, Denmark, Germany, France, the Netherlands and the UK. Each rally was locally organized with original themes. In Ireland, it was “Smash the Fash”, and Switzerland had “Down with Doge...”*

And, of course, from coast to coast in the US Tesla dealerships were closed down because of all the demonstrations, actions, and angry displays.
The whole world hates you Elon. You are universally despised.

The smartest thing Tesla can do is remove Elon and any association for the sake of the company.

Unless Elon holds a majority in the company, in that case id ditch the stock now before it goes any lower.
The world cannot wait for Elon to Occupy Mars.

Just left one in Sunnyvale, CA, which might have the highest concentration of Teslas anywhere in the world. In fact, I would bet on it. Conservatively guessing 700+ protesters and four very lonely pro-Trump counterprotesters.
Great, hit him where it hurts, his wealth.

I am reminded of the generosity of humans all over the world after 911 when they all came together to support us, for they saw it as an attack on democracy.

That is exactly what is going on now. With their demonstrations against  Tesla and other American corporations, they are once again showing their support for democracy.

Americans thank all of you for your support. Yes, these Nazis will be defeated again, and this time no one will give a shit, what SCOTUS has to say in support of these fucking Nazis. All states will refuse to follow SCOTUS  orders and keep these motherfuckers, where they belong, in JAIL.
Guys please stop, you might make 53 year old manchild cry!

posts.title: Wisconsin appeals court won't stop Musk's $1 million payments to voters after attorney general sues
top_comments:
As if people needed more motivation, beyond making sure Elon doesn't get his way, Crawford winning is the only chance of fixing those gerrymandered congressional lines in Wisconsin.

This is why local elections matter, people. In case it's not clear, it all connects.

The article doesn't really cover it, what is the rationale given for denying an injunction?

Musk already committed the felony by making the offer, are they just overlooking that because... reasons?
This isnt even thinly veiled corruption, this is ranked corruption
Kills me that we can’t hand water bottles to people in line to vote, but this vermin can do this crap.
What is to stop any lower election from just paying people a hundred bucks to vote out a school board member or sheriff?
This is unfucking believable.
I think when one can buy democracy at that point democracy is dead.
Laws just, do not apply to billionaires anymore. He quite literally could shoot someone in the middle of Fifth Avenue and no one would do a thing

18 U.S. Code § 597 - Expenditures to influence voting- 

Whoever makes or offers to make an expenditure to any person, either to vote or withhold his vote, or to vote for or against any candidate; and

Whoever solicits, accepts, or receives any such expenditure in consideration of his vote or the withholding of his vote—

Shall be fined under this title or imprisoned not more than one year, or both; and if the violation was willful, shall be fined under this title or imprisoned not more than two years, or both.
My reaction kicked in about a month ago. Arm up...fascism is here.

posts.title: Most employees at US Institute of Peace mass-fired via late-night email
top_comments: Congressionally created and funded thinktank taken over by ‘Doge’ seeks to prevent and resolve global conflicts.

*...there was a standoff as employees blocked Doge members from entering . Doge staff gained access in part with the help of the Washington police.   A White House spokesperson, Anna Kelly, said in an email Saturday that the institute “has failed to deliver peace..."* 

So, fire the Pentagon for failure to deliver defense on 911. That would be far more appropriate and would save 800 billion bucks rather than a few million.
Its illegal, so why does anybody go along with it?

"They have failed to create peace."

Its so childish and stupid.  It's "I don't like your name so I'm shutting you down."  They have no idea what this group does.
What a cowardly way of terminating people.  They are afraid to put a name with a face.
They're not an executive department. Does OMB write their paychecks? What leverage do they have?

I was just at the Hiroshima Peace Park and Memorial Museum. Of the many thoughts that crossed my mind was Trump's first term question to his security briefers - 'Why haven't we used [our tactical nukes] since we have them?'
One of my close friends works there.  They do really important work and America is less safe with them gone

That tracks with this government. I can’t wait to we mass fire the all of the  Americorps. I did the Americorps  program City Year which provided extra support to struggling schools.

 I taught ESL 3rd grade  in MA and all my students were 1st year immigrant students. Some students spoke no english in the beginning of the year and by the end of the year they were near grade level.  some of my students (2nd year english speakers) ended up exceeding grade level requirements.

These programs that cost money do a lot of good for the community and children.
They're still pulling this ahit. Seriously, stop firing people.

posts.title: Hegseth’s younger brother is serving in a key role as liaison and senior adviser inside the Pentagon
top_comments: Obviously a merit-based hire.
Awful lot of nepotism in this swamp. Someone should think about draining it.
Nepotism in a Trump administration?  NO WAY.  They have too much integrity for that.
Another DUI hire like his old brother?
This is like the 1000000th most questionable thing the Trump administration has done

I really hope a motivated reporter gets a bunch of info through FOIA about this dude's hiring process.


Considering how much info the government expects contractors to track and report around OFCCP compliance, it would be neat to find out if his hiring was nothing but an order from up top. You know, because merit and not anything else this could possibly be.


Not that conservatives give two shits about blatant hypocrisy.
So you can just put “Started my own podcast company” and “I do social media” on your resume now and people don’t laugh at you?

My friends hate “DEI” because “merit based!” (Which is its own false argument by itself) but when I bring these kinds of blatant nepotism hires up they go “nothing wrong with wanting people you trust working with you”

So yeah that’s where we’re at. The mental gymnastics know no bounds.
He sneaks the scotch around for big bro.
Is he the one tasked with downsizing it into a trigon?

posts.title: Meat packing plant workers worried over USDA allowing faster line speeds
top_comments:
And see an increase in workplace injuries in 3...2...

Oops, I can't do 1.

The saw just cut my finger off.

The United Food and Commercial Workers Union is against this.

The National Pork Producers Council supports this.

Tells you everything you need to know about this policy change.

Who benefits, the corporate leaders who can force higher output or the workers physically on the actual line?
Biden refused to speed up the poultry processing lines even more because of the risk of increasing that all ready increased food borne outbreaks.
Dudes read The Jungle like an instruction manual.

A lot of safety regulations are built on the suffering, pain, anguish, maiming, and deaths from past tragedies.

[This channel is great for learning about the instances that caused such innovations.](https://www.youtube.com/@FascinatingHorror)

This shit is also why I say Libertarianism is the act of relearning history the hard stupid painful way. You could look at a regulation, crack open a history book, and read about why it exists. 

Or you can deregulate shit blindly then cause the same accident or tragedy to happen  again and again until the victims and community demand the regulation gets reinstated.
First ones on the line should be the 🐷 advocating for it.
Isn't most packing factories having issues w staffing for some reason...   The speed of the line might not be the problem.
The Jungle was not a map to success.

In the early 1900s, Henry Ford started very slightly speeding up assembly/production lines every week. Employees caught on quickly, but injuries skyrocketed. 

We’ve known for over 100 years that this is a bad idea.
RFK says that bacteria are natural part of meat, so are worms. Eat up.

posts.title: Curiosity rover makes ‘arguably the most exciting organic detection to date on Mars’
top_comments:
"Some scientists believe that fatty acids such as decanoic acid and dodecanoic acid formed the membranes of the first simple cell-like structures on Earth, Pearce said."





“(This is) the closest we’ve come to detecting a major biomolecule-related signal — something potentially tied to membrane structure, which is a key feature of life,” Pearce said via email. “Organics on their own are intriguing, but not evidence of life. In contrast, biomolecules like membranes, amino acids, nucleotides, and sugars are central components of biology as we know it, and finding any of them would be groundbreaking (we haven’t yet).”

It’s cool to see the life on mars theory continue to gain validation. There’s a pretty convincing theory that as the core of Mars cooled it lost its global magnetic field which allowed solar winds to wreck the are, and turned what could’ve been a planet that supported life into what it is today.
Too bad there's no one left at NASA to study it.
With the US going to shit at least this some good news
Just say oil. Just say it’s oil and nasa will get a budget of fifty trillion next year

Well poop, the great filter vid from kurzgesagt says something to the effect of if we found even microbial life on mars it would mean we have yet to pass the filter.  So self made apocalypse here we come!

> decane, undecane and dodecane

damn, was hoping they were gonna say cocaine! Mars is made of COCAINE!
I am just glad someone is having a good year. Good for you, little rover!
Bad news for the great filter theory
Sounds like Mars needs some Freedom🦅

posts.title: Small plane crashes in Minneapolis suburb, FAA says
top_comments:
Having listened to ATC recordings for years, one of the points people overlook is many of the smaller airports have controllers with general aviation experience themselves. 

When shit hits the fan, having someone on the radio who can immediately provide guidance and calm based on their own piloting experience in the region isn't really replaceable. 

You're losing that too.
Wow this looks really bad.
The surprising thing is not the plane crashing but people left at the FAA who can speak on its behalf!

So what did the air traffic controllers have to say about this?

Wait there aren't those anymore
How big of a plane are these usually? I'm assuming this is one of those small ones, maybe a handful of people?
At least they survived.

posts.title: Small plane crashes in Minneapolis suburb, FAA says
top_comments:
Having listened to ATC recordings for years, one of the points people overlook is many of the smaller airports have controllers with general aviation experience themselves. 

When shit hits the fan, having someone on the radio who can immediately provide guidance and calm based on their own piloting experience in the region isn't really replaceable. 

You're losing that too.
Wow this looks really bad.
The surprising thing is not the plane crashing but people left at the FAA who can speak on its behalf!

So what did the air traffic controllers have to say about this?

Wait there aren't those anymore
How big of a plane are these usually? I'm assuming this is one of those small ones, maybe a handful of people?
At least they survived.
